article: Miyoko  _  from Japan. She lost her parents in 2011. Now she is  living  in Qingdao. She is  learning  at No. 2 High School. She gets up  _  six every morning. After that, she  _  Chinese. She  has  breakfast at seven o'clock. Now it is seven o'clock in the morning. Miyoko  is having  breakfast  _  her Chinese parents. "Have another egg, Miyoko. It's just 7: 15, "her mother says, "  _  , thank you, Mom, I must go now. Wang Lili is waiting for me  _  the bus stop. Today, we are having a Chinese contest. Bye-bye, Mom. "
